Articles.Content:
hi i just downloaded USI ModPack ( http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79588-0-24-2-USI-Kolonization-Systems-(MKS-OKS)-(0-19-5)-2014-08-07 )

and i really need a video tutorial , it look Amazing and difficult ( i really didn't understand the written tutorial )

that all i want , thanks for reading

I just put together an overview of the resources and modules needed for setting up Lifesupport or a Productionline.

Details are here (however it consists of simple charts but not of a video):

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79588-0-24-2-USI-Kolonization-Systems-%28MKS-OKS%29-%280-19-5%29-2014-08-07?p=1357474&viewfull=1#post1357474

I just put together an overview of the resources and modules needed for setting up Lifesupport or a Productionline.

Details are here (however it consists of simple charts but not of a video):

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79588-0-24-2-USI-Kolonization-Systems-%28MKS-OKS%29-%280-19-5%29-2014-08-07?p=1357474&viewfull=1#post1357474

you make it more difficult for me, lol

I really don't like the tone of your posts EnderSpace. You are coming across very impatient and kinda rude. The time between your OP and second post are kind of ridiculous. Don't expect everyone to drop what they are doing to create and edit a video to explain to you what you can't grasp from the literature provided by the mod.

All that being said, I will have a YouTube series for mods(installation and general info) coming up in the next week or so, but unfortunately I don't think you will have enough patience to wait and see that.

I do hope you figure it out, please try patiently reading through either the USI tutorial or the one that was linked above me.

p.s. Most people don't respond very well to incessant impatience.

Sorry if I sound rude but this week is My last week with PC

As others have said, your timeframe between post and follow up is extremely short, impatience.

If you really want more answers post in the mod thread not here. People who watch the thread are those who develop it and use it.

If you cannot follow the basic tutorial on the wiki, this mod may not be for you.

Part of the fun of KSP is learning and experimenting. Launch some parts and figure it out.
